name: PC
description:
Algo chiquitín que he hecho en 2 días (mah o menoh). 

Habla de cuando estaba muriéndome por dentro en 3º de carrera y me iba a la cama a mirar memes porque no tenía energía para otra cosa.

Los controles son S y W para hacer scroll en el móvil y el ratón para mover la cámara.

English:

Something small I did in 2 days (more or less).

It's about when I was dying inside in third grade of my degree and I just lied in bed looking at memes because I hadn't energy for anything else.

Controls are S/W to scroll on the phone screen and mouse to look around.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Credits and assets used: 

Music from https://www.zapsplat.com

Background noise by LogicMoon: https://freesound.org/people/LogicMoon/

Realistic Bed 01 by Chilla's Art, LLC:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/realistic-bed-01-107993

Free PBR Lamps by New Solution Studio: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/free-pbr-lamps-70181 

PBR Game-Ready Desks Pack by Drunken Lizard Games: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/furniture/pbr-game-ready-desks-pa... 

Laptops Package by Runflyrun: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/electronics/laptop-s-package-8356...
